nsp

Interface Mosaic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RasterMosaic

    public interface Mosaic
    A Mosaic represents a linked collection of individual patch objects, allowing for processes that affect their properties as an entire collection. The use of an interface allows for different implementations to be written (e.g. raster versus vector operations) in a modular manner.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the Patch information and dimensions from the instance.

      • clearVisited

        void clearVisited()
        Resets all Patches to being unvisited.

      • clone

        Mosaic clone()
        Generates a copy of the class instance.

      • getInfested

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Patch> getInfested()
        Retrieves the infested Patches within the Mosaic
        Returns:
        a Map of Patch keys and infested Patches within the Mosaic

      • getNumberInfested

        int getNumberInfested()
        Retrieves the number of infested Patches within the Mosaic
        Returns:
        - the number of infested Patches within the Mosaic

      • getPatch

        Patch getPatch(int id)
        Retrieves a single Patch object using its key.
        Parameters:
        id - - the ID of the Patch object
        Returns:
        - the Patch object corresponding to the key provided

      • getPatches

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Patch> getPatches()
        Retrieves a map of cell objects. Integer value corresponds to the unique index of the cell, defined as row*number of columns + column

      • infest

        void infest(java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate> propagules)
        Infests the mosaic according to a List of coordinate values. Note(!) infestation *must* happen at the Mosaic level due to dependencies on implementation-specific variables.

      • setAgeMap

        void setAgeMap(java.lang.String ageMapPath)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the age information using a path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setDisperser

        void setDisperser(Disperser disperser)
        Sets a copy of the provided Disperser to all patches in the RasterMosaic.
        Parameters:
        disperser - - the Disperser object to be used.

      • setDisperser

        void setDisperser(Disperser disperser,
                java.lang.Integer key)
        Sets the provided Disperser to a single Patch in the RasterMosaic based on its key.
        Parameters:
        disperser - - the Disperser object to be used.
        key - - the key value identifying the Patch to which the Disperser should be applied.
